educations.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering

description: Led a team of 4 engineers to develop and optimize the Pluang and Paham app, resulting in a 50% increase in feature delivery speed and 20% enhancement in user retention.
Spearheaded CI/CD pipeline optimizations, reducing release time by 30% and improving overall deployment efficiency.
Mentored junior developers, enhancing team productivity and code quality, leading to a 30% reduction in bug rate post-deployment.
Implemented a micro app-based architecture using VIPER, which accelerated development cycles by 40% and improved modularity and code maintainability.
Automated KYC processes using Server-Driven UI, reducing onboarding time by 20% and achieving annual cost savings of $100,000.
Developed new user engagement features that contributed to a 25% increase in app sessions.
Developed the Smartivity Magico iOS app using CoreML and Vision, achieving 95% object recognition accuracy.
Significantly enhanced the appâ€™s educational value and user experience.
Built and launched the Mobi-Hub marketplace app, leading to a 50% increase in user engagement.
Achieved this through innovative UI/UX optimizations and seamless in-app navigation.
Designed and developed the Xperia travel app, leveraging location-based services to boost user engagement by 40%.
Achieved a 30% growth in active users within the first year.
